text: You know how people say local newspapers are dying? Or that it's no longer possible to start a journalism career at a local paper? That's false. Work at @BrownsvilleNews. Cover the border from the border. Best decision I ever made.
author: ksieff

text: Among those crossing the border into the US: The descendants of African American slaves who escaped to Mexico 170 years ago. Immigration is complicated.
author: ksieff
